STBLKeyStringList.Text: You have received Fan Mail. It is addressed to StrangerVille Hero. Check {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory to see what they got.
The Vaccine has stopped the infection from taking hold. It seems {0.SimName} is immune to infection, for now...
The Vaccine has stopped the Infection from taking hold. It seems {1.SimName} is immune to Infection, for now...
{1.SimFirstName} is Vaccinated and is temporarily protected from the infection. Recruit them to help fight the Mother Plant.
The Vaccine seemed to caused some kind of reaction, but did not completely isolate the Infection. Keep testing on other Possessed Sims to see how it will react.
Eureka! The Vaccine seems to be isolating the Infection. Head back to the Secret Lab to create the Infection Vaccine on the Chemical Analyzer.
{0.SimFirstName} has successfully crafted an Experimental Vaccine! Test this on Possessed Sims to learn how to craft the true Vaccine.\nReceived: \n{2.String}
{0.SimFirstName} has successfully crafted an Infection Vaccine! Use this on other Sims to Vaccinate and Recruit them to help you fight the Mother Plant.\nReceived: \n{2.String}
{0.SimFirstName}'s diligent analysis of the collected Spore Cluster has paid off. Take this Infection Profile Data to a StrangerVille Scientist to see if they have any helpful information.

You have successfully compiled a Secret Dossier.\n\nThe Dossier can be used to Request a Keycard. I bet Scientists, Military Personnel, or that Curio Shop Owner would be very interested in seeing this.
As {0.SimFirstName} leafs through the book, something interesting falls out:\n• Aerial Surveillance Photo
As {0.SimFirstName} leafs through the book, something interesting falls out:\n• Hastily-scrawled Note
As {0.SimFirstName} leafs through the book, something interesting falls out:\n• Infrared Microfilm
As {0.SimFirstName} leafs through the book, something interesting falls out:\n• Partially Redacted Report
As {0.SimFirstName} leafs through the book, something interesting falls out:\n• Strange Blueprints
As {0.SimFirstName} leafs through the book, something interesting falls out:\n• Suspiciously Blurry Photo
{0.SimFirstName} did not find anything useful on this computer. Maybe one of the others will have something.
{0.SimFirstName} hacked the computer and found:\n• Aerial Surveillance Photo
{0.SimFirstName} hacked the computer and found:\n• Infrared Microfilm
{0.SimFirstName} hacked the computer and found:\n• Partially Redacted Report
{0.SimFirstName} hacked the computer and found:\n• Strange Blueprints
{0.SimFirstName} hacked the computer and found:\n• Suspiciously Blurry Photo
{0.SimFirstName} found StrangerVille evidence:\n• Aerial Surveillance Photo

{0.SimFirstName} found StrangerVille evidence:
• Encrypted USB Device

A skilled Programmer might be able to decrypt it. It can be found in your Sim's inventory.
{0.SimFirstName} found StrangerVille evidence:\n• Glitched Hologram Readout
{0.SimFirstName} found StrangerVille evidence:\n• Packet of Mysterious Seeds
{0.SimFirstName} found StrangerVille evidence:\n• Partially Redacted Report
{0.SimFirstName} found StrangerVille evidence:\n• Suspiciously Blurry Photo

This door is locked. Looks like it requires a Keycard. Someone around town might know how to get one. Before leaving, poke around the Secret Lab to gather more information.\n\nNew Notebook Entry Added.
These Spores are too toxic to pass without protection. Question about Spores around town to see if there is some way to protect yourself.\n\nNew Notebook Entry Added.
The Local Library is known to have Scientists researching the StrangerVille Archives. I wonder what they are looking for...
Have you checked out the Curio Shop near the trailer park? I hear they have a Secret Inventory that might be worth checking out.
I heard there are strange things going on at that Secret Lab. The Scientists and Military Personnel around here can probably shed some light on the situation.
Check out the Local Bar. There are always Military Personnel unwinding after a long day on the base.
I have noticed those Bizarre Plants have grown double in size, as if something is growing inside them.
That strange cloud that is building over the crater does not look normal. I bet something is trying to get out...
I overheard some Military Personnel talking about an Infection Scanner at the Local Bar. they use it to uncover Spore Clusters. You may want to convince one of them to give it to you.
I overheard some Scientists talking about Infection Profile Data. Talk to them about spores and they may share some information.
The Conspiracy Theorists around here believe the Military is behind some kind of cover-up.
I’ve heard there’s some kind of Secret Lab in the crater outside town.
I have noticed a lot more Scientists at the Local Library. You should check it out.
The Local Library holds tons of history about StrangerVille. There are always Scientists browsing the StrangerVille Archives.
Have you been noticing those Bizarre Plants popping up around town? You best keep your distance from them. The local Scientists have been running tests on them.
I am always curious what goes on in that Secret Lab. After that explosion a few weeks back I have not seen anyone go in or out.
You should really check out that Secret Lab. I hear there are strange things going on there. You should be able to sneak in through the back gate.
The Local Bar is known to have Military Personnel winding down after a long day on the base.
Wow, you did it! Let me analyze this Infection Profile Data and I will send you a Spore Filter in the mail soon. Keep digging and you might find a Vaccine for this Infection after all.
Did you really think that you could beat me up and take my scanner? Think again!
I yield! Take my Infection Scanner. You've earned it. Just stop hurting me!
You have got to be joking... You think that is "Impressive." You are going to have to get stronger if you are going to impress me.

Wow! that was an impressive display of strength. Look... I really should not be doing this but I think you should have this Infection Scanner. You can use this to reveal Spore Clusters that are otherwise invisible to the naked eye.
I have some information about what is going on in that Secret Lab, but I will only share that with close friends.
I am not sure if I can trust you. We barely even know each other.
I can't really say what's going on. My CO plays things pretty close to the chest. We're always kept on high alert in case something happens at the nearby lab.
There is something shady about that Secret Lab. I think there is a major cover up brewing.
That Secret Lab is cursed. Everyone that works there is cursed!
Look...I really should not be saying this, but there are some strange things going on at that Secret Lab. There was some big explosion and now everything is sealed shut.
I know something is going on at that Secret Lab. No one ever goes in and out of it. They must be holding something in there...
I hear that the Military is hiding something in the Secret Lab. They have doubled security ever since that big explosion.
I have a few theories about what is going on in that lab, but I am not going to share that with just anyone.
We are instructed to keep quiet about all information regarding the Secret Lab. I can't share that information with just anyone.
I used to work in that lab, but ever since the explosion... I have said too much. I can't share that information with strangers.
I have been noticing a lot more of these Scientists around town. I bet anything if you can get close to one of them they would be willing to give you a Keycard for that Secret Lab.
There is much more to that Secret Lab than you know. You should keep digging.
Military Personnel are always hanging out at the local bar. I bet they have heightened security because something went wrong at the Secret Lab!
Secret Lab... are you kidding me!? Why would I put my life on the line for you? I hardly know you.
I barely even know you! What makes you think I would risk my life to help defeat this "Mother Plant" you speak of. That is nothing but a bunch of mumbo jumbo.
You want me to go down there with YOU!? What do you know about fighting giant alien plants? We hardly even know each other.
Of course I'll help you destroy the Mother Plant. I am all for clearing StrangerVille of this vile infection.
I think I have a Keycard in my Secret Inventory. I will only sell this to you if you can prove you are committed to this StrangerVille Investigation. Maybe if you have a Secret Dossier.

Look... I really should not be doing this, but you seem like you can help with this terrible situation. Take this Keycard. This will give you access to all the doors in the Secret Lab. Just be careful, no one has been down there since we sealed the doors.
I hear the Scientists and Military Personnel have access to a Keycard. Try asking them.

I'm just an old retired fighter pilot. Do you really think I would have access to some fancy Key Card? I bet one of those Scientist or Military Personnel would have something for you. I doubt they are just handing those things out tho.
I am not sure what you're talking about. I bet the Curio Shop near the trailer park might be able to help you out.
Wow! Thanks, but no thanks. I'm keeping my Infection scanner.
Wow... that was amazing! I really should not be doing this but take this Infection Scanner.
Those Bizarre Plants around town are part of something much bigger. I'm not saying that they're controlling people, but I have seen some very strange behavior from people recently.
These dust particles in the sky are loaded with strange bacteria! The Military is putting it there on purpose. They are running test on us like we are some kind of test subject!
That Bizarre Fruit that has been popping up around town is the cause of all this! DO NOT EAT IT! I don't even know where people are getting it from.
Look... there are some really strange things going on in this town. It all started a couple weeks ago. There was a large explosion inside that crater and things have not quite been the same since!
I just got this new Infection Scanner. It is really cool, it can.... I mean... That is classified information! But if you can convince me maybe I can give you one...
There is something big going on here! The Curio Shop owner has started selling Hazmat Suits. I noticed everyone has been stocking up, but I fear that may not be enough...
I have a couple of those Hazmat Suits in my Secret Inventory. I doubt they will do much good without a Spore Filter, but I would be willing to sell it to you if you are still interested.

I have the materials to craft a Spore Filter, but I have not been able to analyze enough Spore Clusters. Use the Chemical Analyzer at the Secret Lab to construct the Infection Profile Data. Bring it to me and I can construct a Spore Filter.
You already have the Incomplete Hazmat Suit. Question about Spores with Scientists to see if they can improve it.
You already have the Spore Filter. Question about Spores with the Curio Shop Owner to see if he can sell you something to combine it with.
You already have an Infection Scanner. You can use that to scan areas for Spore Clusters. I bet there are a ton at the Secret Lab.
The StrangerVille Hacker Forums thanks you for your upload. We will review your submission, and get back to you within 1 Day. We can't say much, but make sure to keep a close eye on your Mail Box.
Your Keycard requisition form has been received. We will follow up in a few days when it has been processed.
(From Requesting Energy From the Mother Plant)
The Mother Plant won't go down easy. Recruit more Sims to help, or craft some extra Vaccines to throw at her!
The Mother Plant is extremely powerful. Best not fight her alone. You can now create Vaccines on the Chemical Analyzer. Vaccinate and Recruit other Sims to fight the Mother Plant.
(From Requesting Success From the Mother Plant)

Newspaper Clipping: “After the incident, there have been reports of Bizarre Plants growing around town. No one has been able to figure out why they are spreading so quickly. Efforts to eradicate them have been fruitless; for each sprout removed, three grow back in its place.”
Old Newspaper Clipping: “The Military Arrives in StrangerVille! Residents rejoice as a new base opens near the crater. The City Council welcomes the opportunity of new jobs for the struggling town.”

Letter to the Editor: “They say they’re here to help us, but there’s barbed-wire around the crater now! What are they trying to hide??? Doesn’t anyone see what’s going on here?!? Wake up, sheeple! Also, a quick shout out to the Curio Shop near the old mobile home park. They have some great shirts and posters for those of us in-the-know.”

Unsolved Mysteries of StrangerVille: “A local resident claims that after he found his lost cat outside the crater, it became unreasonably afraid of his houseplants and wouldn’t stop hissing until they were all removed from the property.”

Promotional Flyer: “Clogged drains? Call Undercover Plumbers for a free inspection. We’re available at all hours, even when you’re not at home! Our state-of-the-art vans are equipped with the latest in satellite-uplink plumbing technology.”

Recent Newspaper Clipping: “New Era for StrangerVille! A high-tech super-science facility is being constructed in the crater. While residents are eager to modernize the town, the amount of secrecy surrounding the project has some people on edge.”

A History of StrangerVille: "Stories passed down by the indigenous people who lived in the region long ago speak of a blinding purple light in the sky followed by a massive explosion. It is believed that this is the source of the StrangerVille crater.”
Nothing to see here. Move along.
Have you been to the Secret Lab yet, Soldier? If you’re rank 5 or above, you can use a computer to requisition a keycard to restricted areas.
I actually don’t know much about StrangerVille. Up until recently, I spent most of my time at the Secret Lab in the crater.
This has always been a military town, but it sure seems like there's a lot more of them around lately.
There’s nothing interesting at the Secret Lab in the crater. Especially not in the basement. Don’t bother going there.
People shouldn’t worry about the Secret Lab in the crater. We have top people working on it right now. Top. People.
There’s some kind of cover-up going on. I’ve been listening in on the Military people at the local bar to see if I can figure anything out.
Those crackpot Conspiracy Theorists think there’s a cover-up at the Secret Lab in the crater, but they haven’t got a clue.
There’s some very interesting plant life around here. Have you seen any of it yet? I don’t advise messing with it too much.
The Secret Lab in the crater outside town is off-limits to civilians. Under no circumstances should you go there.
Have you heard of the Secret Lab in the crater? I wanna go see it.
I’ve heard there’s some kind of Secret Lab in the crater. I’m convinced it has something to do with the weird storm that caused my plane to crash.
You may have heard rumors about an explosion at the Secret Lab in the crater. Totally false! There’s nothing interesting going on there at all. Move along.
Hello, Soldier. As you know, guarding the Secret Lab in the crater is our top priority.
The implications of what we’ve discovered in the crater are astounding! I mean… er… the Secret Lab is totally boring and not worth even thinking about.
It’s our job to protect these people from whatever it is those science geeks found in the Secret Lab. I wonder what’s in the restricted area…
Even though we’re Military, they won’t let us see all of the Secret Lab in the crater. Have you been there yet, soldier?
StrangerVille is a lovely town. I hope you enjoy your time here, just stay away from the Secret Lab in the crater.
I don’t have lots of time to talk, I’m busy studying some of the plants around town. Fascinating!
I worked at the Secret Lab in the crater until recently. Now my attention is on the town itself.
If someone got enough Evidence they might be able to use it to get a Keycard to the lower floors of the lab. Let’s all hope that doesn’t happen.
There are ways to get a Keycard to the basement of the Secret Lab if you get enough Evidence of the strange stuff going on in town.
I got a piece of Evidence about the StrangerVille mystery from a Military officer I befriended.
I bet if you get enough Evidence of the weird stuff happening, you could convince a Scientist or Military officer to give you a Keycard to the lab.
I have some Evidence of what’s been going on, but I’m not supposed to talk about it.

Military ranked Warrant Officer (level 5) or above can get a Keycard to the restricted area of the lab. Just use a computer to Requisition a Keycard and they’ll mail one to you. I've heard civilians are finding ways to get them too though.
I convinced one of the Scientists to show me some Evidence about the covert operations here in StrangerVille.
I was told to be on the lookout for someone asking for Evidence from the local Scientists and Military. Do you know anything about that?
Some sinister stuff is going on around here. If I knew someone trustworthy enough, I might even show them the Evidence I found.
I’ve been told that if anyone asks me for Evidence, I should report them. But I’m starting to think the public should hear about what’s going on.
I heard someone has been poking around the Secret Lab. As long as they don’t get a Keycard to the lower floors, things won’t get out of hand.
The Military and Scientists are the only ones who have access to the restricted area of the lab. Maybe you can get a Keycard from one of them.
You can get a Keycard to the basement of the Secret Lab if you get enough Evidence of the strange stuff going on in town.
I bet there’s all kinds of weird stuff behind that locked door in the Secret Lab, but you need a Keycard to get in.
My friend dared me to go into the basement of the Secret Lab, but I’m too freaked out! Plus, I don’t have a Keycard to open the door.
Even if I had a Keycard, I don’t think I’d go through the locked door in the Secret Lab.
Hi, Soldier. Only people with a Keycard can get to the basement levels of the Secret Lab. I’ve heard there’s some weird stuff down there.
There are restricted areas in the Secret Lab, but you need a Keycard to get in.
I know it can be tempting to see what’s in the restricted area of the lab, Soldier, but I advise against going in there, even if you have a Keycard.
Only people with a Keycard can get to the basement levels of the Secret Lab. I’ve heard there’s some weird stuff down there.
Someone has released spores from the lab! With enough Spore Clusters analyzed at the Lab, I could create a breathing filter for them.
Someone broke into the lab and released spores! We’re using our Infection Scanners to find them.
I heard a Scientist talking about analyzing Spore clusters at the lab.
I’ve been watching; the Military are using Infection Scanners to find Spore Clusters. Then they take them to the lab.
Soldier, the Scientists need Spore Clusters. Our orders are to use an Infection Scanner to find them.
I wonder if I could convince someone in the Military to give me an Infection Scanner…
The Military is gathering Spore Clusters, then we need to analyze them at the lab.
It looks like the Scientists want Spore Clusters and the Military is using Infection Scanners to find them.
The Scientists want Spore Clusters. We can use our Infection Scanner to find them. Have you found any yet, Soldier?
With all these spores in the air, a Breathing Filter would be useful. I could create one if I had Infection Profile Data from analyzing Spore Clusters at the lab.
Have you seen all the spores in the air? Something must’ve happened at the lab! I heard the Curio Shop has some kind of protective gear, maybe I should look into that.
Some Military officers were talking about gathering Spore Clusters to analyze at the lab.
Hey, Soldier, have you been given an Infection Scanner yet? You can use them to detect Spore Clusters.
I saw some Military people gathering Spore Clusters with an Infection Scanner.
Move along, citizen, I need to use my Infection Scanner to find Spore Clusters so we can analyze them at the lab.
Oh my goodness! Something crazy is going on!
Everyone is acting super weird! My friend wouldn’t even talk with me, they just had this creepy look on their face.
This is insane, right? I hope someone finds a cure for the spore infections!
I heard there was some kind of monster in the lab and it’s the source of all this!
I’m so glad things are back to normal!
I wonder if the whole “Mother Plant” thing was a hoax. I mean, does anyone have any proof?
I wonder if they’ll reopen the science facility in the crater? Surely nothing bad could come of it.
Now that those crazy plants are gone, maybe we can get back to things that matter like collecting rocks and cooking grilled cheese sandwiches.
Don’t tell anyone but… I kinda miss those weird plants.
I know we’re all safe now, but I can’t get the image of all those possessed weirdos’ faces out of my mind!
That was some weird, wild stuff, right?!? Luckily it all seemed to work out.
Things seem like they’re back to normal… for now.
People are strange when you're in StrangerVille. Faces look shady when you're in town.
*KRRRRSSHHHHHZZZZTTTTHHZZZZ* (Something seems to be blocking the signal)

"I'm telling you, there is SOMETHING happening in the crater! I've seen the lights in the sky!"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"Yeah, yeah, a 'weather balloon' crashed in the crater. That's what THEY want you to think."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"Someone's gotta sneak into that lab and figure out what is going on!!"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"I don't trust fruit anymore, and neither should you."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"If there's nothing in the lab, why aren't we allowed in?! Explain that!"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Top Secret Audio Recording

Some of this lab equipment is crazy advanced... I've never seen anything like it!"

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Top Secret Audio Recording

Of course I could get you into the lab... for a price."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"No, General, I don't know where those seeds came from..."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"I gotta keep moving... the military is on my tail!"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"Been finding a lot of weird stuff in that crater... gotta be worth something!"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"They don't let me into that base anymore... not that I'd ever go back!"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"They think they have it under control. Psshh. More like it's got THEM under control."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"They say it's some freak lightning storm, but I don't buy it. Ain't never seen a storm like that before..."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"Buncha cowards. Abandoned that lab as soon as things got rough."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"I feel safer away from town... can't trust anyone these days."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"I've seen some crazy stuff in my day, but that lab... still gives me the shivers thinking about it."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"I know what the colonel said but... c'mon, the people have to know what's going on in that crater!"

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"There's only one guard at the lab!? What if someone sneaks in!"

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"The order came from the very top... no one is allowed back in the lab."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"No one knows where it came from... even the eggheads can't figure it out."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"... I told him my favorite color is blue... but it's not... it's yellow..."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"I mean... everyone's got a secret child somewhere, right?"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"I mean, what's one... okay, ten... little lies?"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"...if this gets out, I could be in HUGE trouble..."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"...it's not stealing if I REALLY want it, right? They won't miss it anyways..."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"... don't tell anyone, okay?... no, not even your cat..."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"... sure, some people have skeletons in their closet... I've got an entire GRAVEYARD in there..."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"... of course I trust you with this information... you're the only friend I have!"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"...c'mon, you agree right? Her new haircut is awful!... just don't tell her I said that..."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"I may have committed some... light treason."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"You're sure no one is listening?... Okay, I'll tell you..."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"What he doesn't know, won't hurt... me... so, it's fine."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"Don't worry where the money came from... it's fine... nobody is gonna find out!"

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"If the government knew what I was up to... well, let's just make sure they don't find out..."

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"... but you gotta keep that secret. No one can know!"

{0.SimFirstName} received:

Basic Audio Recording

"And they were like, 'Please, spare me! I have a family!'... Hilarious. Love this job."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"All those gravestones? Cardboard and duct tape."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"Oh, I much prefer cats... They're tastier AND less filling!"

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"Don't tell anyone, but I'm not wearing anything under this cloak."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"Y'know, no one asks old Grim how he's feeling."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Basic Audio Recording

"Science can't explain what we found down there... it's... otherworldly."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"I'm just a botanist, I don't know anything about space rocks!"

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

Top Secret Audio Recording

"That... thing... in the lab... the whole town is in danger!"

Top Secret Audio Recording

"I'm never stepping foot in that lab again! I might as well burn my keycard."

{0.SimFirstName} received StrangerVille Evidence:

"The things they made us do in that lab... I still have nightmares."
