The hacker community has come through. {0.SimFirstName}'s Key Card has been delivered to their mailbox.
The StrangerVille Hacker Forums really appreciates your "donation", {0.SimFirstName}'s keycard is out for delivery. Keep an eye on your mail for a special delivery.
Your Keycard is out for delivery. Keep an eye on your Mailbox.
Your Keycard requisition request has been approved. Please allow 1-2 days for delivery.
{0.SimFirstName} should check the mail. {M0.His}{F0.Her} Spore Filter has been delivered to {M0.his}{F0.her} mailbox.

{0.SimFirstName}, I ran some tests on that Infection Profile Data. I constructed a Spore Filter that will attach to any Hazmat Suit. This will give you everything you need to go deeper into the Secret Lab. Keep an eye on your mailbox for a special delivery.
Some of the townsfolk have expressed some concerns about some incident that happened. It might be helpful to question people around town to see whats going on.
Seems as if some people in StrangerVille are hiding some rather valuable information. It might be worth digging a bit deeper to see whats really going on here.
The Secret Lab is containing some viral outbreak. Try to equip yourself with the necessary tools to investigate a Vaccine.
You have found the source of the infection. It is time to recruit enough people to stop it.

After much planning and investigation, and perhaps a bit of unconventional combat, {0.SimFirstName} has freed StrangerVille from the clutches of the Mother Plant. StrangerVille can now sleep safe and sound. \n\nTrait Earned: Hero of StrangerVille
StrangerVille is holding some deep dark secret, and this Sim wants to uncover why all the townsfolk are acting a bit strange.
Builds Logic at the cost of a little stress.
Builds Fitness at the cost of some fatigue.
My superior told me to clean...Now I must clean.
What is going on here! These plants are getting out of control!
Admiring the amount of medals in the case can fill any Sim with a large amount of confidence.
Admiring the amount of medals in the case can fill any Sim with a small amount of confidence.
Admiring the amount of medals in the case can fill any Sim with a medium amount of confidence.
Sometimes it's not worth looking at all of those old case files. It can be pretty stressful at time.
Running extra drills has aggravated muscles that you didn't know you had.
You are bursting with the Mother Plant's power!
The Mother Plant is extremely powerful. Best not fight her alone. Try vaccinating and recruiting allies to help defeat her.
The Mother Plant is extremely powerful. Regroup and reanalyze your strategy in order to achieve victory.
The Mother Plant has granted your Sim ultimate career success.
You and your allies will deal more damage to the Mother Plant, but will also take on more Infection.
You and your allies will take on less Infection but will deal less damage to the Mother Plant.
You and your allies are recovering from Infection and will deal no damage to the Mother Plant.
You and your allies cry out repelling the Mother Plant's Minions.
ŦĦ€ ΜØŦĦ€Ř ĆΔŁŁŞ ΔŇĐ I ΜUŞŦ Ř€ŞPØŇĐ
The machines still remain our superior... for now.
People just don't understand! When something happens, they will have wished they listened.
Other people on the internet agreed with me so it must be true!
Danger lurks around every corner! Better stay inside to avoid any danger.
Nothing beats being deep underground surrounded by concrete, shelter, and pure safety.
Paranoid Sims don't like being around others that are whispering. What are they talking about? Are they talking about me!?
As an Evidence Eraser {0.SimFirstName} is required to clear all evidence of top secret case files. If any of that evidence slipped out into the public there would be mass panic.

Conspiracy Squelchers are the front lines in stopping all talks of conspiracies around town. If there is any talk of discussion of the strange phenomena it is {0.SimFirstName}'s duty to put a stop to it.

Clandestine Investigators have proven they are able to undergo secret covert missions. {0.SimFirstName} must investigate the strange happenings around town, and will be required to plant bugs to listen in on the unsuspecting.
Sim-In-Black is the highest honor in the entire Covert Ops branch. There are only a few Sim-In-Blacks in the world and {0.SimFirstName} is now one of the few.
As a Raw Recruit {0.SimFirstName} will need to build their physical fitness in order to rise through the ranks of the Military Career.
Privates are the back bone of the day to day work around the base. {0.SimFirstName} must carry out any and all orders given to them.
Corporals are the key to base security. {0.SimFirstName} will begin to train and master sparring techniques in order to defend any threats to the base.
Sergeant Minors have mastered the art of Sparring. {0.SimFirstName} can demonstrate their mastery while competing with others in hand to hand combat.
Warrant Officers have demonstrated they know their way around all combat drills and exercises. Keep improving your physical fitness and {0.SimFirstName} will soon be able to order platoons.
Lieutenants have proven they can master all physical challenges and are now fit to Order platoons and train them to the best of their ability.

Captains are the most battle hardened veterans anyone could hope to be. {0.SimFirstName} is the focal point of any company and must do whatever it takes to make sure the company can succeed. If {0.SimFirstName} fails, their company can be in jeopardy.

Lieutenant Colonels are tasked with commanding battalions to ensure a safe and successful mission. The coordination and tactical mastery of each mission will fall to {0.SimFirstName}. If they fail the mission fails.

Brigadier is responsible for tasking missions out to the various platoons. {0.SimFirstName} is no longer tasked with field duty, but the role of Brigadier is to ensure the missions that platoons take on are safe and well planned out.

Grand Marshal is the highest position in the Military. {0.SimFirstName} has proven excellent field tactics and the ability to lead and order effectively. {0.SimFirstName} can wear their medals proudly knowing they are the highest ranking official in the entire Military.

The Covert Ops Branch is the part of the Military that no one talks about. You will be required to undergo secret tasks, by planting bugs and listening in on the unsuspecting. You will need to interrogate any and all suspicious individuals. No one can be trusted, and everyone is up to something. Are you up for the task?

Physical fitness and discipline will be the keys to success in the Military career. Rising through the ranks will not come easy unless you can demonstrate your physical prowess as well as your ability to recruit and be a leader. Will you pursue the path of a Grand Marshal, or will you follow a more secretive path to uncover what others might be hiding?

In the Officer Branch you will continue to earn medals while you rise through the formal ranks of the Military. The Officer path will see you earning the highest rank possible and becoming a Grand Marshal. To build your leadership skills you will be tasked to order others and build to peak physical fitness. No Grand Marshal can be outdone by a Raw Recruit!
Sleek and elegant the copious rounder is the perfect column to accent any classic home.
Hand crafted from the finest of used wood the Leafed Capping will add the perfect finishing touches on any ceiling.
Strong and supportive this column will never fail. However if it feels betray you better not let your guard down.
Interior or exterior the Porch Break column will keep things standing strong.
Those so-called “scientists” have figured out a way to filter the air, but they’re not sharing it! They want us to be sick!!
This is madness! They’re testing experimental vaccines on anyone who is possessed! I’m starting to wonder if this whole thing was planned from the start so they have an excuse to do this to us!
The Military are talking about “Operation Big Mama” and stopping “Subject B377-A”. If I could get some of that Infection Vaccine, I’d be inclined to help them.
I knew it! I always knew there was something big going on in that lab!
Those Scientists say they have a way to make a breathing filter but, like, they’re only going to give it to their lackeys. What about us NORMAL people?!
That curio shop is fighting the good fight. Always scrounging up secret government equipment and exposing them for who they REALLY are!
You wanna know the truth?? Visit the curio shop near the trailer park. They’ve got stuff that would BLOW YOUR MIND!
Whoa, cool hazmat suit! You gotta use that to get to the bottom of this whole conspiracy. I wish I could go with you!
I heard the Scientists were working on some kind of vaccine against this infection.
The government doesn’t know what they’re doing! Someone needs to take the initiative and to test a vaccine. I bet the equipment at the lab could do something like that.
I overheard the Scientists talking about needing to go to the lab to craft a vaccine to stop the infection spreading from something they called “Subject B377-A”. I wonder what that means?

The Scientists and Military are testing experimental vaccines on any possessed people they find. I wouldn’t want to be possessed, but I’m not sure if I’d want to be a guinea pig for untested stuff like that!
I have a Hazmat Suit that can help protect you against all these spores, but it’s missing a breathing filter. I bet a scientist could make you one.
Nice breathing filter you got there. I’ve actually got the perfect thing to go with that in my secret inventory... It’s a little pricey but I think you might be interested...
I think you have everything you need to make a pretty stylish hazmat suit, but you’re always welcome to spend more money here, if you want.
If my plane could still fly, I’d get the heck out of here ASAP!
I knew I was going to regret crashing in this town. Seems like our only hope is for someone to find a vaccine that’ll stop this infection from spreading.
If I can get some of that Infection Vaccine they made, I’d be willing to head down into the lab and get revenge on that Mother Plant for causing the storm that crashed my plane!
Sorry citizen, I leave the math-y mumbo jumbo to the Scientists. Maybe they can make sense of that Spore Profile Data.
Our orders are to turn over any data to the Scientists as soon as we get it. They’re working on some sort of Breathing Filter.
We’ve been trying to shut down that curio shop for weeks. It’s always selling restricted equipment... that’s government property!
That curio shop thinks it’s so sneaky with its secret inventory but we know what they’re selling...
Citizen, I hope you’re not using that hazmat suit to go anywhere “restricted”. I’d be required to report you to my CO.
Don’t worry, citizen, the Scientists are working on an Experimental Vaccine. They need Spore Clusters and Bizarre Fruit for the Chemical Analyzers at the lab.
We need to test the vaccine on possessed people as quickly as possible. If we can’t find something that works soon, things are really going to get out of hand.
Now that we’ve figured out an Infection Vaccine, we need to use it to stop the infection from spreading and recruit the vaccinated to fight the Mother Plant.
We need to get this Infection Vaccine to people. Once vaccinated, we can recruit them to help take down that menace in the lab.
The Scientists want Spore Clusters. We can use our Infection Scanner to find them. I’ve received intel that there is a large concentration around the lab.
Soldier, the Scientists need Spore Clusters. Our orders are to use an Infection Scanner to find them. Check around the lab.
Soldier! Get that profile data to a Scientist pronto! They need it to make a Breathing Filter.
Way to go, soldier. I’m sure a Scientist would love to see that Spore Profile Data you got. They love that nerdy math stuff.
Soldier! Check out that curio shop ASAP and see what kind of stolen equipment they’re trying to sell now.
Well DONE, soldier! With that hazmat suit you should be able to get even deeper into the lab.
It’s go time, Soldier! The Scientists are working on an Experimental Vaccine. They need Spore Clusters and Bizarre Fruit for the Chemical Analyzers at the lab.
Soldier, keep an eye out for the possessed. We need to test the vaccine on them so we can put a stop to this madness!
Operation Big Mama is under way, Soldier. We need to protect people with the Infection Vaccine and then recruit them to stop the Mother Plant at the bottom of the lab.
Oh good, you managed to get an Infection Scanner. There’s probably a high concentration of spores around the lab. Come back to me after you’ve collected and analyzed them!
By my calculations, if someone can vaccinate and recruit three allies, they’d have enough to surround the Mother Plant from all sides and defeat her.
Once you’ve found enough Spore Clusters and analyzed them at the lab, I can make a Breathing Filter for you. Surely there is a higher concentration near the source of the infection.
If you can provide me with the Spore Profile Data I can craft a breathing filter to protect your lungs from this infection.
Unfortunately, that breathing filter won’t do any good without the rest of the suit. Luckily, I’ve heard that the curio shop has one of our older models in their secret inventory.
Excellent! Looks like you’ve got all the pieces you need to craft a hazmat suit. It should provide enough protection to allow you to go deeper into the lab.
If we can get some Spore Clusters and a Bizarre Fruit to the Chemical Analyzer at the lab, we can start working on a vaccine against the infection.
The Chemical Analyzers at the lab could create a vaccine against the Mother Plant’s infection. We just need to gather some Spore Clusters and Bizarre Fruit for testing purposes.
We need to find possessed subjects so we can test the experimental vaccine on them.
I hope the we can test the vaccine quickly so we can help all those possessed people around town.
Is it real? Is it there?
Cold and ridged, this fence will wined through out your home like rolling peaks of metal and iron. Gaze upon its beauty and never take it for granted.
In need of a tried and true barrier between you and your pesky neighbors? Fear not the Classic Picket has you covered.
Worried about unwanteds finding their way into your yard? Keep everything out with this Almost Gapless yard fence.
Where Larry keeps his most prized mementos on display! That's right, the ones he won't sell he would tack on to this bar for safe keeping. Check weekly for new ones added!

Perfect for all types of indoor use. Even though it has a sturdy and rigid structure, it provides the best comfort in a lightweight frame. Perfect for those who just want to be able to relax without much fuss.
101 tips on avoiding unwanted snoops and spies. Written By: [REDACTED]
The answers to all of life's greatest mysteries. The true reason you are stuck in this canyon.
A book containing plans for all of Crystal Vu's top secret diabolical inventions. Most of these are probably out of date by now, but still worth a read.
A compilation of all untold mysteries of StrangerVille. There are sure to be some we missed...
7000 Tips and tricks to truly believe you are an effective fortune teller.
Dignified bookcase, sturdy even in adversity. Holds your books, while holding your style together. Feel free to store any kind of literature, it won't judge you.

The perfect machine for all your particle and chemical analysis needs. Well, maybe more than analysis...\n\nOk...Fine, it has a lot of buttons and makes some noise, but we are not entirely sure what it actually does, but looks cool right?
Made with authentic rustic materials. The worn look is also authentic.

Traces of Infection has been detected in this refrigerator. We have confiscated it for further investigation. Please refrain from going near the Secret Lab and have a nice day.\n\nYour Friendly Neighborhood Secret Agents
Strange Note From StrangerVille Secret Agents
The Medal Display Case will allow your Sim to neatly display all their Military Medals as they rise through the ranks. Don't forget to admire all of your hard-work and dedication.
Unlock by reaching level 2 of the Military career.
Unlocked at level 2 of the Military career.
Awarded for excellent technical knowledge and performance in the field.
The highest accolade one can receive in the Military. Awarded for demonstrating overall field knowledge, the ability to recruit individuals, and be a top notch leader.
Awarded for acts of selflessness and courage in the field.
Awarded for realizing that life is not always under your control and there is something larger at work.
Awarded for showing excellent engineering and construction skills in the field.
Awarded for demonstrating exceptional sight, and ability to spot minor details in the field.
Awarded for demonstrating the ability to pilot a rocket with exceptional skills.
Awarded for demonstrating bravery against chaos on the field.
Awarded for demonstrating commitment and perseverance to make it this far in the Military.
Awarded for displaying top notch tactical expertise out on the field.

Spore Clusters can be used on the Chemical Analyzer at the Secret Lab to construct useful items. You can find Spore Clusters by using the Infection Scanner to scan areas with a high concentration of spores.
With all your favorite functionality from the Basic Portable Computer, but now in more fresh and fun colors. Yes you need to pay more for cool colors...

Tired of sitting at home on a beautiful day, but you still need to get that report done for work! Fret not, the Portable Computer has you covered. This high tech piece of equipment is the perfect companion for any hard working individual. From your favorite bar to your aunt Sally's for Harvest Fest, the portable computer can be taken anywhere. It even comes with a battery. They usually charge extra for that.
This portable computer looks like it has been completely abandoned. Who knows what secrets it could be hiding...

Grunge is IN!\n\nThe designers at Nacar Marmalade wanted to focus on the raw look. They believe that the new Lot appearance is a thing of the past. With this decal, you can add that grungy, worn out effect to any wall to make it look edgy, vintage, and lived in without incurring in rent increase.
With the success of Grunged Splatcal #1, Nacar Marmalade decided to add a second version into their catalog. You can use them together for intensified grunge.

Modern and professional. Perfect for those who like for their workstations to be always tidy, or at least look that way from all angles. Comes with conveniently placed drawers for all that sensitive data you are hiding...yes, we know where they are...;)

When is a door not a door? When it’s a portal. A portal to another dimension. A dimension not just of things seen and heard but of things only in the mind. You’ve entered through the Zone Door and your next stop? StrangerVille.
The Notjustador Collection – The Zone Door

When is a door not a door? When it’s a gateway - a gateway to supernatural realms whose doors may, in fact, swing both ways if one has mastered the keys. Things that go bump in the night will pass freely between our mortal plane and theirs….and you thought I was just gonna say, “ when it’s ajar.”

Don't let the appearance fool you, come on in! This door might look like it has seen better days, but its construction is top of the line to widthstand any disaster scenario. Properly insulated! Hardware and installation not included.
Why did the chicken cross the threshold of the Aether Door in StangerVille? To get to “the other side”. Personally, I’m too chicken to open this door. What about you?
The Notjustador Collection – The Aether Door
What awaits beyond the stately antiquated threshold of the Bosch Door? Total enlightenment? Or Purgatory, perhaps? Do I really need to paint you a detailed picture?
The Notjustador Collection – The Bosch Door
When is a door not a door? When it’s got so much glass in it that it might as well be a window. Well, here it is….It’s a door, it’s a window – it’s a Windoor.

Looking to get more door for less Simoleons? Well, we’ve got just the door for you! The MoreDoor - I mean, just look at the size of this ominous entranceway It’s as big as a mountain! Don’t ring, just go on in…what’s the worst that could happen?

Local lore has it that this old eliptical arch used to be a door. Until, one day, those doors just turned up gone. Folks ‘round here think it mighta been them door snatchin’ space travelers what took ‘em. I just say, “that’s business as usual here in StrangerVille”.
The Experimental Vaccine needs to be tested 3 times before you are able to construct the Infection Vaccine on the Chemical Analyzer.
The Infection Vaccine can make Sims temporarily immune to the Infection. You will need to use the Vaccine on Sims in order to Recruit them to fight the Mother Plant.
This Bizarre Fruit has an ominous glow to it. As if it contains some living spore... This thing should probably not be eaten.
This Bizarre Plant has an odd glow about it, as if it is being controlled by some other entity. It looks as though there is something growing inside of it...

I don’t know about you, but when I can’t see through to the other side of a gate, I get very nosey. I start to question everything. What’s back there? Is this where half of all socks go? Is this where they store everyone’s two cents? If the gate is opened, will I be the person who let the dogs out? Why can’t I have my cake & eat it too? Purchase the Gates of Quandry and become instantly omnipotent.

Heck top quality wrought iron gates are drop forged in the sweltering furnaces of Heck by sweaty folks that know a thing or two about forgery. So, when anyone asks me where to get a great gate, I always tell them to go straight to Heck.

If I told you what awaits you on the other side of this otherwise innocuous looking gate, would you still go in? OK then, I’m not tellin’, but I will say this, I know for a fact that this object was built with a Para-Normal Map applied to it. Strange? Oh, I think so.
This can be used to modify an Incomplete Hazmat Suit. Question the Curio Shop Owner about Spores. He might have an Incomplete Hazmat Suit to sell.
The filtration system on this suit is not enough to filter through Toxic Spores. Question Scientists about Spores to see if they can improve it.
This will allow passage through Toxic Spores in the Secret Lab as long as it is worn.
Number of Scans Before Recharge: 3\nThe Infection Scanner can be used to reveal Spore Clusters by clicking and scanning the ground. Try scanning areas with a high concentration of spores.
Collect 15 pieces of StrangerVille Evidence to compile a Secret Dossier. Evidence can be found by questioning the locals or poking around the Secret Lab.
These top secret blueprints look like they are for some giant structure. It looks like they are trying to contain something massive!
This Junk Pile totally does not contain any helpful information for the StrangerVille Investigation...

Some places of work like to be discreet and blend with their surroundings, not the ones using this door though!

Complete with lighting and scrolling text enabled, this door wants to let you know where you are and what you are doing there.

Note:You may use this in a secret lair, but it might stop being secret...

Not for the discreet.

Complete with lighting and scrolling text enabled, this door wants to let you know where you are and what you are doing there.

Note:You may use this in a secret lair, but it might stop being secret...
This will grant access to all doors in the Secret Lab.

Is it a ship? Is it a dish? Is it a spacedish? Spaceship?

For the conspiracy theorist and fan of the unknown, this ceiling lamp adds playful flair to any Lot. It may not always look chic, even with chic being a personal thing, but it will definitely evoke questions...lots of questions.

Note: No, it doesn't fly.

A creation from Gr00vy Lights, Co. Part of a series they said. A modern take on the traditional lava lamp in a deceptively friendly glow. Its design screams space alien and minimalist modern design all at once. Give your room a hint of retro-cool with this floor illumination piece. People will swear it came from outer space.\n\nDid we say deceptively friendly glow? We mean...cool space alien glow!
A creation from Gr00vy Lights, Co. Part of a series they said. Still giving your room a hint of retro-cool, still making people wonder where it came from.\n\nNOW IN GREEN! Super Green!

A creation from Gr00vy Lights, Co. Part of a series they said - and they were not joking! Need more pink in your life? This Lava Beacon is the perfect solution for that!\n\nWhat? Who said that cool alien glow cannot be pink? Nonsense!
Gr00vy Lights, Co. wants you to explore the depths of the color yellow with this version of their unique series for the Lava Beacon. Yellow hues to relax and set the tone for groovy evening.

The last installment (we think) of Gr00vy Lights, Co. Lava Beacon series.\n\nYou don't have to feel blue with this shade of blue. Enjoy the depths of space in this blue shade that will evoke your grooviest space fantasies, and maybe conspiracies.
DYI chic and functional, what this lamp puts in effort makes up with style.\n\nAlready assembled.
Almost too clinical for normal day to day use.\n\nWarning: If the light flickers...don't call us. Just Run!
Re-purposing at its finest! Authentic truck parts, polished for a fresh look for your walls. No junk here!
This Spy Bug can be planted on other Sims. Once planted, Purchase a listening device from the Catalog to listen in on the bugged Sim.
The Listening Device will allow your Sim to plant bugs on other Sims and listen in on them. You never know what juicy gossip you will find out.
A Listening Device Recording can be given peacefully given to other Sims or used against them as blackmail!
Recording of: {0.SimName}\n\nThis can be combined with other StrangerVille Evidence to compile a secret dossier.

What’s the point of going on vacation if you don’t bring back a plethora of precious plastic memories that you can cherish for several weeks then discard like an orphaned orange sock? Well, if that’s what you’re hankerin’ for, visit The Knick Knack, Bric-A-Brac Shack whilst in StrangerVille. If they ain’t got it - it don’t exist…or does it? Inquire within. Ask for Larry.
The Mother Plant in all its glory!
The Mother Plant Pit. To use this make sure the Mother Plant is placed directly in the center of this object. Enjoy your own personal Mother Plant Pet, but BE CAREFUL SHE BITES!
The Mother Plant Pit. To use this make sure the Mother Plant is placed directly in the center of this object. Enjoy your own personal Mother Plant Pet, but BE CAREFUL SHE BITES!

A collection of posters that are usually on display at the StrangerVille National Base. From scientific theorems to military promotional posters this collection has everything you need to make you feel right at home on the base.
Where will it take you? Where will you go?
Well, it seems like it is definitely out there...
Still not able to be explained in plain terms. Moo!
A painting can tell a story, or we can use a painting to tell a story. Whatever your motivation, allow these paintings to tell a story for the ages.
A barrier so impenetrable you would want to replicate across all your Lot. It is also a beautiful industrial look for any fan of that style.\n\nMade with actual cement.
This strange sprout looks a bit strange. It looks like something is living inside it...
Give this to any StrangerVille Scientist to construct an effective Spore Filter. You can find them hanging out at the Local Library.
These Strange Floor Vines do not look very safe. WHY ARE THEY MOVING!

Looking for a planting DIY project, but without actually making it yourself?

Are you a plant lover? Are you a lover of vintage and classy decor? Say no more!

The Clawfoot Fanciful Planter is the perfect balance of 'Do It Yourself' and classy chic that is the rage these days, turning any space into a beautiful and peaceful space, and without breaking the bank! Plants are included for maximum efficiency.
This Plant Containment Cell can contain the peskiest of flora. It is also nice to display other things as well, I guess...
Add a personal touch with this custom crafted finial spire.
Customized, stylish tileable finials for any home. Blendable with modern and vintage styles.
GENIUS from Nacar Marmalade!\n\nFor even smaller spaces and with no corners that will randomly curl up, how can it? It IS the corner of the rug! Who says you can't indulge?

We’ve collected the top ten conspiracy theories from around the world, reprinted them in all their redacted glory, and constructed a paper mache rug for you to spend countless hours pacing over how it’s all connected.

Nacar Marmalade believes that it is OK to not have a giant space for art and that art can be anywhere and it comes in every size. This half of a rug is for those that don't have enough space to place the Large version of this series, or want a rug on their terms.
Accented with details that mark a successful and honorable career in the Military.

Deliciously vintage looking patterns for the lover of trends of old, and maybe not so old anymore. Bring some joy to your life with something that looks and feels expensive, but only you know it isn't.
From Nacar Marmalade! Who believe that a worn and raw effect can create the perfect Lot.\n\nKeep your guests guessing, is it mold? Is is it dirt? Oh...it's a rug?

It was the Summer of that year. We spent our days in the desert sun, combing the sands seeking to uncover The Truth. A novel Shelly had lost the previous year. We found The Truth, and she disappeared on a Tuesday. It was noon. I was relieving myself in a bush. I returned to our favorite sand dune, she was gone. The desert sand was scuffled, was it the wind or a struggle? I don’t know, but I have my photo. My photo of Shelly.
Made with 100% military grade materials. Comes with all accessories you need, only to be used as shown. Assembly not required.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Military career while in the Officer branch.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Military career while in the Officer branch.
Just a non harmful sculpture version of the Bizarre Plant in its Dormant State.
Just a non harmful Sculpture version of the Strange Sprout

What were they thinking! The 5000 prototype was too much for the world! The 5 mi… well it incinerated the first 17 people that tried to get purify their rooms. I’d never seen purification move so fast. They hit a button, and then… well there was a sound, a spray, and they… let’s just say I’m glad I was 18th in line. Why did they keep stepping up for a try? I’m not sure I… why would they… I need some fresh air to get my bearings.
With 3 sides of blinking lights, no blinking light display blinks more than the Blink O’matic.

What secrets are contained within this obelisk? What strange language are these hieroglyphs upon its surface? Bob from accounting says it’s a broken server stack. He found a whole bunch of them in the basement. I don’t agree. I think it’s alien tech! I hear it humming in my sleep. I think it wants me to serve it goulash. I’m not sure I know how to make goulash.
A part of Old Penelope. This Engine must have dislodged in some kind of crash.
A part of Old Penelope. This Cockpit must have dislodged in some kind of crash.

Old Penelope is the tried and true cargo plane of George Cahill. She has put in many long years shuttling goods back and forth across the world. Unfortunately a freak storm while flying over StrangerVille has put her out of commission. Hopefully one day George will muster up enough energy to put the old horse back together.
A part of Old Penelope. This Wing must have dislodged in some kind of crash.
A part of Old Penelope. This Wing must have dislodged in some kind of crash.
For all your creature containment needs. Made from almost unbreakable materials, this barrel will help contain the meanest of creatures.\n\nWarning: Contents vary, and they may or may not...bite.
Scratched, bruised, and cold this lonely table has been through a lot. It will never falter it will never waiver. It will stand the test of time. Just don't place anything on it.
Complete with accessories. Live and relive the illusion of scientific work with this piece. Just beware of what can awaken...
Super safe, we promise! Don't pay attention to the label, feel free to explore their contents.\n\nWarning: Contents vary, and they may or may not...bite.

With the destruction of the Mother Plant you take the time to carve out a small trophy to display in your home. Now everyone will know that you put an end to the Mother Plant's control over StrangerVille.
Taken from [REDACTED], this [REDACTED] is [REDACTED], filled with [REDACTED] and will help decipher [REDACTED] with [REDACTED].

That nook that no one dares to look into but can't avoid. That window you see in all houses that seems to hold many secrets, and that no one seems to inhabit. What is it hiding? What is it showing?\n\nWait...Is that something moving up there?!
This box of unassuming papers is probably not your grandmothers' box of old photos. Something about the redacted text on the side seems a bit off...
This small cluster of beakers and burners is sure to fill out any small lab. We will not question what strange experiments these are being used for.

The Crabby Bottom Armadillo is always there to cheer you up. If you ever need to put a smile on your face, stare into this armadillo's confused little eyes. He never disapproves of you, and is always there to make you laugh. Everyone loves the Crabby Bottom Armadillo.

The Crabby Bottom Armadillo is always there to cheer you up. If you ever need to put a smile on your face, stare into this armadillos confused little eyes. He never disproves, and is always there to make you laugh. Everyone loves the Crabby Bottom Armadillo.

The Crabby Bottom Armadillo is always there to cheer you up. If you ever need to put a smile on your face, stare into this armadillos confused little eyes. He never disproves, and is always there to make you laugh. Everyone loves the Crabby Bottom Armadillo.
Stacks on stacks on stacks... and not the good kind. Just looking at this stack of unorganized papers is overwhelming!
People should really not be leaving such important documents lying around on the floor like this. Anyone can rummage through these to find important things.
This can be used to obtain a Keycard for the Secret Lab. Check the Curio Shop Owner's Secret Inventory, or ask Scientists or Military Personnel around town.

The Wacky Wonderful Carnival Sock is the perfect decoration to tie together your eclectic arts home. Do you like collecting souvenirs from the many places you have been? What better than this creepy looking souvenir.

The Wacky Wonderful Carnival Sock is the perfect decoration to tie together your eclectic arts home. Do you like collecting souvenirs from the many places you have been. What better than this creepy looking souvenir.

The Wacky Wonderful Carnival Sock is the perfect decoration to tie together your eclectic arts home. Do you like collecting souvenirs from the many places you have been. What better than this creepy looking souvenir.

The Wacky Wonderful Carnival Sock is the perfect decoration to tie together your eclectic arts home. Do you like collecting souvenirs from the many places you have been. What better than this creepy looking souvenir.
This stack of totally unassuming and not confidential papers should probably not get left out on any old table. Who knows who might be interested in this information.
Relax as the soothing vistas scroll by. Escape to another reality, and forget the time and all your troubles... IM LATE!
You may not be a world leader, but that doesn’t mean you can’t decorate like one!
These monitors display top secret information about what could be hiding in the StrangerVille Secret Lab.
Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Military career while in the Covert Operator branch.
Unlocked at level 8 of the Military career while in the Covert Operator branch.
They may work...or not.\n\nBut don't they look like they belong there?
For fortresses, secret laboratories, and villain hideouts. Some may worry about the size of it, but trust us, it is so giant it will go unnoticed.

A revolution was waiting! Purification at the speed of sound… BOOM! A fresh smelling room without the hassle of gurgle, gurgle, shhhpeew, gurgle, blurp, pshooooooooo… finally my fresh aerated room, 10 minutes later. But the world wasn’t ready. Purification at that speed was too much to handle. People didn’t know how to handle that much power. The sheer pure-osity of it all was too much for people to control.
These Strange Wall Vines do not look that safe...WHY ARE THEY MOVING!
We aren’t sure what it does, but the manufacturer said it was impressive just to look at, and it is! Plop this metal behemoth down in your home and wonder at its protrusive-ness!
See all your stored items like a pro! Everything visible and accessible. Nothing to hide here, nothing to hide.

Resourceful enthusiasts will challenge themselves to create DIY projects safely and affordable. This shower project is not an exception and we might say, the bar has been elevated. A couple of canisters, water hose, and an old "gently" used bathtub can become the bath of your dreams with a few adjustments. Assembly not required, use at your own risk.

It kind of makes you wonder what were the signs displayed? The dreams they shared...The colorful text in their infinite possibilities. The current look evokes the deepest thoughts about life and the passing of time.

Durable and rustic, this sign will let you place the signs of your choice and promises to withstand any scenario of disaster. Comes complete with lights so you can see your desired sign, even in pitch black!

Perfect complement to The Tekxhnik. This chair will make you feel like you are the captain of a spaceship, or just look super cool in your office, lab, or for the home if you so choose. Assembly not needed.
For all your futuristic, sci-ency staging needs.

Welcome to the Soundtastic Fantastic Royale! Prepare for the journey of your life! Want to hear something old? Something new? Have you eyes light up with anticipation for when you think you will hear your favorite song. No shame in listening to that song that makes you sing out of the top of your lungs, or that song that makes you cry and hug everyone. The Soundtastic Fantastic Royale has them all and is there for you!
The strange and inoffensive music it blares is laced with mystery and subliminal messaging. Maybe.
The B64 Training Bot is the perfect companion for Sims to practice their sparring techniques. Be careful, this bot fights back!

This training bot looks like it has been dressed up to replicate the behavior of something... But what could it be? Looks like whoever put this thing together really needs to work on their hot glue gun skills.
Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Military career while in the Officer branch.
Unlocked at level 8 of the Military career while in the Officer Branch.

Made by up and coming design firm We Are Very Mysterious - Really, Inc. This beautiful and regal tall window will be a center of attention of inhabitants and passerbys alike.

The company's creative minds got inspired by vintage wooden textured windows with a hint of mistery and the phrase "The eyes are the windows of the soul" to create this piece that will make you want to look, but won't let you due to the fantastically crafted iron fence that adorns it.

Keeping secrets in, fabulously.

Looking for some "normal" windows? Not into the over the top flair and intricate designs? Look no further! The Discreet will offer a simple, and functional design that will adorn your home lot as intended. Not calling too much attention to your home lot, but giving a hint of intricacy with its grooves and small details that you can see if you are close...like reaaaaally close.

From the secret minds of the Specter design firm, comes a carefully crafted piece that will make your home feel a little bit more Midnight Hollow and less Del Sol Valley. Give your home a classic look that is simple and elegant and create an air of mystery effortlessly.

The Specter design firm decided that if you are going to design a home lot, all aspects should be cohesive. Specter's vision not only focused on the visual real state for living rooms or bedrooms, but the group considered the attic as more than just a storage room, and that it deserved its own window to match.

Following the success of "Window Of Mystere", the We Are Very Misterious -Really, Inc. design firm decided to go one pane further. Presenting Shuttered Mystere, with added shutters! For creating a look that only can be opened from within.
Following the steps of the original The Discreet, now it comes in a two pane version to delight your classic yet refined vintage taste, giving your lot a cozy, homey vibe.
Specter's vision for bigger wall spaces, the three pane offering of the Arched Aperture brings even more visual real state to make your home lot even more luxurious.

The residents of StrangerVille say that this mysterious lab holds some deep dark secrets. Though there are many rumours, no one has ever set foot in the Secret Lab since the explosion. The Military seems to be keeping a close watch to ensure nothing goes in or out. Although security is tight around the lab, the locals say there is a small crack in the back of the fence that someone might be able to slip through undetected.
Located on a spacious corner lot in the StrangerVille Plaza The Riverside Grove is a quaint home for a small family.

The Sigworth family is rather new in town. Jess, the mom, had to transfer to the StrangerVille National Base. After spending a few days on the base Dylan has started to notice something is a bit off about his wife. Although Dylan is doing all he can to reassure their daughter that everything is okay. Christie is starting to catch on and it is only a matter of time until she realizes what is going on.

Old Penelope is the tried and true cargo plane of George Cahill. She has put in many long years shuttling goods back and forth across the world. Unfortunately a freak storm while flying over StrangerVille has put her out of commission. Hopefully one day George will muster up enough energy to put the old horse back together.

George Cahill was a retired pilot who enjoyed taking his beloved plane Penelope for long flights across the world. After passing over StrangerVille there was a large flash of light causing his plane to short circuit and crash. George has since set up camp in the cargo bay of Old Penelope, and has lived on the outskirts of StrangerVille ever since. Although he has grown skeptical of the residents of StrangerVille he means no harm and mostly keeps to himself.

Nestled in the the heart of the StrangerVille Plaza, this quaint home is perfect for anyone new in town. Right across from the StrangerVille Library and the hottest bar in town Carpophagous Corner will put you right next to all the best attractions StrangerVille has to offer.

8 Bells is the hottest bar in StrangerVille. Though they have little competition, the locals swear by the drinks. Located just near the StrangerVille National Base, you can always find Military Personnel winding down after a hard days work. The staff is friendly and are always looking to tell stories of StrangerVille.

The StrangerVille Information Center is a great place to hang out and study. We have a massive StrangerVille Archive where anyone can browse till their heart is content. The archives contain information about all the weird and unusual phenomena that has happened in our lovely little town. You can always find local Scientists here trying to brush up on research.

Slip 42 used to be home to a local Conspiracy Theorist. One day they just decided to leave, no warning or notice, they were just gone. Upon inspection we found a strange note saying something about finding the Answer to the Ultimate Question of Life, The Universe, and Everything. The tenant even left all of their belongings behind. Those Conspiracy Theorists are definitely a strange bunch, but lucky for you Slip 42 is now vacant.
Nestled slightly outside of town, and overlooking the StrangerVille creek. This quaint cliff side plot is bound to make the perfect foundation for any home.

Dream Weavers Way is tucked high atop a plateau where you can hear the babbling brook and embrace your inner creative self. Perfect for any starving artist that is just looking to get away from it all.

The Eclectic Arts Household consists of three friends who have decided to cut ties with the modern world in order to explore their inner creativity. They received a large sum of money from their parents, and are using it to explore their creative dreams in a less hectic town.
StrangerVille is known for its plateaus and unique rock formations. There is no better place like Plateau Place to take all of that in.
Providing the best views overlooking StrangerVille, Cliff Side Crest is the perfect place to build your dream home. Just ignore the strange lights coming from that crater.
With the best views of the StrangerVille Plaza the StrangerVille Overlook is the perfect place to keep a watchful eye on the tiny town of StrangerVille.

The Roswell's are the oldest residents in StrangerVille. Ted Roswell has since become the mayor and has been aggressively pushing to get StrangerVille to be more technologically advanced. He has made some shady deals, but his crowning achievement has been the construction of the Crater Base and Secret Lab. Ted's wife, Meredith, has been noticing Ted acting very strange at night. It might have something to do with his frequent visits to the Secret Lab to try and cover things up.
Restricted to Military Career Personnel Level 5 or higher.
{0.SimFirstName} has already requisitioned a keycard. Check the mailbox after mail is delivered.
Requires: Secret Dossier\nUse Evidence in your Sims inventory to compile a Secret Dossier.
Upload Secret Dossier to the Hacker Forums
{0.SimName} is being devoured by the Mother Plant. This will be the end of {0.SimName}.
A Photo of Bizarre Plant has been added to your Sims Inventory.
You already have a picture of this in your inventory.
Requires: {1.SimFirstName} to Be Recently Vaccinated\nAdminister Infection Vaccine before trying to Recruit to Fight Mother Plant.
Requires: 5 Spore Clusters and 1 Bizarre Fruit\nUse the Infection Scanner to scan for Spore Clusters, and Nurture a Bizarre Plant to get Bizarre Fruit.
You must wait some time before nurturing this plant again.
Traces of infection have been detected in your refrigerator. We have confiscated it, and all of its contents. A refund has been issued for any inconvenience this may have caused.
Battery Power Low: Allow time for this unit to recharge.\n\nTry scanning near areas with a high concentration of spores.
Requires: Spore Filter\nQuestion Scientists around town about Spores to get a Spore Filter.
Requires: Incomplete Hazmat Suite\nQuestion the Curio Shop Owner about Spores to see if they can help.
It doesn't look like there's anything useful to find here... for now.
This has already been searched. Try asking other StrangerVille residents or looking in other places for more evidence.
{1.SimName} wasn't happy about being Blackmailed, but they coughed up some Simoleons to make sure that recording never got into the wrong hands.
{1.SimName} didn't notice the bug being planted. Use the Listening Device to see if {1.SimName} spills any important information!
Thank you for shopping at Curios, Creations, and More... No one ever asks me what the "More" is, but any-who enjoy your new items.
Buy and Wear a Novelty T-Shirt
Come back after encountering Strange Spores in the Secret Lab.
Question about Spores in Lab with the Curio Shop owner. Maybe he has something that might help.

Enjoy your brand new Incomplete Hazmat Suit, I told you it was missing a crucial component... You might want to Question Scientists about Spores. They might be able to provide some kind of Spore Filter.
Come back after examining the Lab Door in the Secret Lab.
Request Keycard from the Curio Shop owner to see if he can provide any information about this.
Trade the Secret Dossier and some Simoleons for the Keycard to the Secret Lab
{0.SimName} just obtained the Keycard. It should grant access to any door in the Secret Lab.
Requires: StrangerVille Evidence\nTry searching around StrangerVille to see what you can dig up.
Your Sim is going to need all the evidence they can get for a Secret Dossier.
Tell Story about Defeating the Mother Plant
Requires: Infection Profile Data\nThis can be discovered on the Chemical Analyzer at the Secret Lab.
I really shouldn't... but whatever, the government has tons of these. Here you go!
Requires Military Career rank 5 or higher
Have the spores gotten to your brain?! You need to be at least a Warrant Officer to do that.
Sir yes Sir! Here's my Infection Scanner. I will requisition a new one from my CO.
{1.SimFirstName} is already recruited\nRun "Fight with..." on the Mother Plant to have {1.SimFirstName} join you in the fight.
Move Lips to Make Human Sounds
The Mother Plant will only grant 1 request a day.

With a snap of her mighty tentacle the Mother Plant has spread a small amount of spores over StrangerVille. There will be a small number of Possessed Sims walking the streets, and the Bizarre Plants have returned to their sprout form.

With a snap of her mighty tentacle the Mother Plant has spread a medium amount of spores over StrangerVille. There will be a medium number of Possessed Sims walking the streets, and the Bizarre Plants have returned to their blooming form.

With a snap of her mighty tentacle the Mother Plant has spread a large amount of spores over StrangerVille. There will be a large number of Possessed Sims walking the streets, and the Bizarre Plants have returned to their blooming form.

With a snap of her mighty tentacle the Mother Plant has removed all spores from StrangerVille. There will be no more Possessed Sims walking the streets, and the Bizarre Plants have all been eradicated.
This Sim is knocked out! Command another ally to revive them!
You are deep in battle with the Mother Plant and unable to save or travel while fighting.
Your team deals more damage, but becomes infected faster!
You recently changed the fight mode. Your allies need some time to perform your command.
Your team resists the Infection, but deals less damage.
The sprayer is too hot. Give it time before unleashing another Mega Spray.
Your team heals some of their Infection, but does no damage.
It's too dangerous to throw another one right now!
Your Sim is out of Vaccines!
Your team scares off the Mother Plant's minions, but does less damage.
Requires: Bizarre Fruit\nThe Curio Shop probably has a few Bizarre Fruit.
The circuits are too hot to repair. Give this machine some time to cool down.
This computer seems to have some encryption. Requires Handiness skill 9 or higher.
Thank you for shopping at Curios, Creations, and More... No one ever asks me what the "More" is, but any-who enjoy your new items.
A Photo of Sealed Door has been added to your Sims Inventory.
Requires: Keycard\nQuestion Scientists, Military, or Conspiracy Theorists to see how to gain access.
Requires: Level 10 Programming Skill\n Who knows what secrets this could be hiding...
Requires: 15 Spore Clusters\nQuestion Military Personnel at the Local Bar to get an Infection Scanner. It can be used to find Spore Clusters.
Your analysis of the Spores is complete. Ask any Scientists to Craft the Spore Filter to give them the Infection Profile Data.
Converts an unused Experimental Vaccine in the sim's inventory into an Infection Vaccine.
Requires: Sim to be Actively Posessed\nFind Possessed Sims walking around town to test the Experimental Vaccine.
The Vaccine seemed to caused some kind of reaction, but did not completely isolate the Infection. Keep testing on other Possessed Sims to see how it will react.
Eureka! The Vaccine seems to be isolating the Infection. Head back to the Secret Lab to create the Infection Vaccine on the Chemical Analyzer.
I feel so much better. I can think clearly and that terrible sound in my head is gone.
Requires: Requires 15 Pieces of StrangerVille Evidence.\nWith a Secret Dossier, you can convince someone to give you a Keycard for the Secret Lab.
I don't think that's such a good idea {0.SimFirstName}.
{0.SimFirstName} Does not have anyone available on the lot to Practice Sparring With...
Requires: 1-3 Allies\nUse the Chemical Analyzer to construct Vaccines to Vaccinate and Recruit allies to help fight the Mother Plant.
You must be near the Mother Plant in order to run this interaction.
You cannot fight the Mother Plant while you have the Infected Trait. Craft a Vaccine on the Chemical Analyzer to cure yourself.
Place a bug on another Sim to listen in on their conversations.
Death will not fall for such silly tricks!

There is nothing to see here. Everything is within normal operating levels. Please abstain from going near the Secret Lab and have a nice day.
I feel so much better. I can think clearly and that terrible sound in my head is gone.
Requires: Sim to be Actively Possessed\nFind Possessed Sims walking around town to test the Experimental Vaccine.
You have all the information that you need to cure the infection. Head back to the Secret Lab to create the Infection Vaccine on the Chemical Analyzer.
You've already tested the vaccine in {1.SimFirstName}. Seek out another Possessed sim to test the Experimental Vaccine.
You must wait before spreading more Bizarre Plants.

Welcome to StrangerVille: "The only thing stranger than the people is the flora!" Soon after moving in, the town’s slogan is starting to make sense to you. Some of the locals are acting a bit suspicious and there's a large number of Military and Scientists in town. Try asking people about StrangerVille. They might be able to shed some light on this strange situation.

Leaving the Secret Lab you can't help but notice the sky has shifted to an eerie color. Something has changed in StrangerVille, and not for the better. Opening that lab door must have released some kind of toxin into the air.\n\nYou will need to find a way to protect yourself from the toxic spores in the Secret Lab. Try talking to people around town to see if they know of anything that might help.

You’ve discovered the source of the infection plaguing StrangerVille: an enormous “Mother” plant buried in the base of the lab. The only way to get the town back to normal is to defeat the vile creature!\n\nFind a cure for the infection and assemble a team to destroy the Mother Plant.

With one last screech the Mother Plant collapses. Returning home you notice that things are beginning to return to normal. The Bizarre Plants are subsiding and the infected are waking up from their nightmare. StrangerVille owes you a huge debt. You are a Hometown Hero!\n\nYou have defeated the Mother Plant and returned StrangerVille to “normal”! You can return to the Mother Plant at any point to reawaken her. Once resurrected, you can have her set the Infection Level to your desired Strangeness. This will allow you to replay the story with other families.
Ugh, this air is getting GROSS! One of these scientists needs to invent something to make it easier to breathe!
All my neighbors have been infected. I’d do anything to help bring them back to normal.
Why haven’t these scientists come up with something to filter this polluted air!
That Curio Shop is always selling science-y equipment... I wonder where it comes from?
This air is getting so nasty I’m afraid to even leave my house. I wish I was wearing a hazmat suit!
Be careful walking around outside. The news said the air is getting worse every hour!
There are so many possessed people around! Can’t somebody find a cure for them or something?!
I think the Scientists are collecting Spore Clusters so they can make some kind of vaccine at the Secret Lab.
It seems like they’ve figured out a way to cure people. I hope this all gets fixed soon!
If I had access to the Infection Vaccine, I’d be willing to help put a stop to this terror!
Find a Keycard to open the Secret Lab Door.
Construct a Modified Hazmat Suit to get through Toxic Spores and explore deeper in the Secret Lab.
Buy a Hazmat Suit from the Curio Shop.
Give a Scientist the Infection Profile Data for a Spore Filter.
Install the Spore Filter on the Incomplete Hazmat Suit.
Wear the Modified Hazmat Suit to open the Second Door to the Secret Lab.
Defeat the Mother Plant and rid StrangerVille of the infection.
Recruit Sims to fight the Mother Plant.
Use the Infection Vaccine to give other Sims immunity to the Infection.
Collect and analyze 15 Spore Clusters on the Chemical Analyzer to discover the Infection Profile Data.
Create an Infection Vaccine on the Chemical Analyzer at the Secret Lab.
\nUsed for: Eating, Fun, Alternate Light Source.
Top Secret Recording of: {0.SimName}\n\nThis can be combined with other evidence into a Secret Dossier.
Thank you for saving StrangerVille from that terrible infection. Here is a small token of thanks.
Recording of: {0.SimName}\n\nThis can be used to Blackmail {0.SimName} into giving you a few Simoleons.
Music for when you're feeling a bit strange...
The Listening Device will allow your Sim to plant bugs on other Sims and listen in on them. You never know what juicy gossip you will find out.
Click on your sim and select Go Jogging.
Purchase a Training Bot from the Catalog. Click on it and select Practice Sparring.
Click on your Sim select March Around
Click on the treadmill and select Workout.
Click on a Workout Machine and select Workout.
Search around the secret lab and find some investigation evidence.
Click on another Sim and run the Interrogate interaction.
After you plant a bug on another Sim click on the Listening Device and select Listen In On.
Plant a Bug on Another Sim
Purchase Bugs from the Listening Device, then click on another Sim and select Plant Bug
Go to the Library. Click on a bookshelf and select Research StrangerVille Archives.
Click on a computer and select Write Report.
Click on another Sim and run the Give Inspirational Speech social interaction.
Click on a Sim, select Order To... and run any Order To... interaction.
Click on the Training Bot and select Practice Sparring.
Click on the B64 Training Bot and select Practice Ordering Around
Recruit Other Sims to the Military
Click on another sim and select Recruit.
Click on a computer and select Research Historic Battles.
Click on another Sim and select Spar.
Click on another Sim and select Order To, then Drop and Give Me 20.
Click on another Sim and select Talk about StrangerVille.
Buy Curio from the Curio Shop
The Curio Shop can be found near the trailer park. Click on the stand and run Buy Curio... to see what they have to offer. Supposedly there is even a Secret Inventory.
Examine Sealed Door at Secret Lab
Travel to the Secret Lab at the edge of StrangerVille and investigate the Sealed Door.

Evidence can be found all over StrangerVille.
Search boxes and papers at the Secret Lab.
Search StrangerVille Archives at the Library.
Question Sims around StrangerVille.
Buy a Listening Device to Listen In On Scientist and Military Personnel.
Collect evidence throughout StrangerVille. Then click on it in your Sims inventory to Compile a StrangerVille Dossier. The Secret Lab might be a good place to start for evidence.
Open the Sealed Door in the Secret Lab
That door at the Secret Lab requires a Keycard. Talk to people around town to see if they know where to get one.
Find an Infection Scanner by questioning Military Personnel at the Local Bar. Once you have one in your inventory scan the ground to reveal Spore Clusters.
Find a Hazmat Suit and a Spore Filter then Combine them in your Inventory. Question about Spores With Scientist at the Local Library, and the Curio Shop Owner to get more information.
Traverse to the deepest part of the Secret Lab
Pass through the Toxic Hallway to open the final door deep in the Secret Lab.

Create Experimental Vaccine on the Chemical Analyzer at the Secret Lab. Test this 3 times on Possessed Sims to unlock the ability to create the Infection Vaccine on the Chemical Analyzer. Once you have an Infection Vaccine you will be able to Vaccinate other Sims and Recruit them.
Recruit {1.Number} Sims to Help Stop the Source of the Infection
Click on Sims to try and recruit them to Fight the Mother Plant. Infected Sims will not want to assist you.
Defeat the source of the Infection
This is the Final step to eliminating the infection from StrangerVille. It will not be easy...
ExcUUUUUuuusssEEee yOOuuUu! We prefer the term "Vintage," thank you.
As the Hero of StrangerVille you will receive fan mail as well as being able to retell the tale of how you defeated the source of the Infection.
Congratulations! The vile tyranny of the Mother has been brought to justice. Your heroic victory has been compensated with a sampling of the Mother for you to display.
Perform interactions on the Mother Plant to deplete her health!
Gather your allies and take battle to the Mother Plant itself.
You are not authorized to do that while being investigated.
Some of your new neighbors are stopping by to welcome you to StrangerVille, but something is definitely... off... about them.
The Mother Plant is trying to infect you! Defeat her before you get overwhelmed by the Infection.
Requires: Higher Relationship\nPeople in StrangerVille are not going to share top secret information with just anyone.
Requires: Secret Dossier\nUse Evidence in your Sims inventory to compile a Secret Dossier.
Requires: Higher Relationship\nPeople in StrangerVille are not going to share top secret information with just anyone.
Requires: Higher Relationship\nPeople are not going to put their life on the line for just anyone.
Requires: Higher Relationship\nPeople in StrangerVille are not going to share top secret information with just anyone.
The weather is far too strange to use the Weather Machine here.
As the Hero of StrangerVille you will receive fan mail as well as being able to retell the tale of how you defeated the source of the infection.
Paranoid Sims feel that danger is around every corner, and that people are always talking about them. Paranoid Sims feel a sense of security while hanging out in basements.
Infected Sims have been exposed to the StrangerVille Infection. Sims might exhibit strange behavior, or even become Possessed.
This weather seems a bit out of the ordinary... It might have something to do with that Secret Lab.

StrangerVille Plaza is where the locals like to hang out. You can find Scientists at the Library, Military Personnel at the Bar, and The Curio Shop near the trailer park.\n\nYou can buy some strange odds and ends here and you will find all the information you need.
Pristine, secluded, and nestled high atop a plateau, Shady Acres is home to the more wealthy locals of StrangerVille. Curious how some of them came into their wealth?
